companyName: Keller Woods & Thompson, P.A. - Minneapolis, MN

moreBlocks.lawyersAtKellerWoods&Thompson,P.A.Select: • Keller, Lindsay M. On a Super Lawyers® List

description:
Based in Minneapolis, Keller Woods & Thompson, P.A., advocates for victims of personal injury incidents in Minnesota and Wisconsin. Our law firm excels at helping people through some of their most challenging moments. We do more than simply say that we put our clients first; we actually do it. Clients of our practice receive personalized, one-on-one attention from start to finish, beginning with the free initial consultation and illustrated in every interaction afterward.

The comprehensive personal injury practice at our law firm includes matters such as the following:
• Car, boating and trucking accidents
• Slip-and-falls
• Medical malpractice
• Dog bites
• Wrongful death
• Drunk driving accidents

With decades of experience among us, we know precisely how to build an argument that targets maximum compensation. Our team accounts for the many ways in which a client may have suffered, such as the physical harm they have endured, the mental anguish they have experienced and the financial losses at stake. We consult with subject matter experts to devise a strategy that holds defendants accountable for their actions.

Our attorneys excel at both negotiation and litigation. We stop at nothing to fight for every dollar owed to our clients. Keller Woods & Thompson, P.A.., accepts credit cards. Our law firm also provides clients with virtual appointments when meeting in person is not a possibility.
